mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIT_SCHEDULE ( SDATE, SMEMO1, SMEMO2, SMEMO3, SMEMO4, SMEMO5, MID ) VALUES( #{sdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smemo1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smemo2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smemo3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smemo4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smemo5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
